title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Cook spaghetti in a large pot of salted boiling water until al dente.
In a pan, cook pancetta or bacon until crispy. Add garlic and sauté for 1 minute, then remove garlic.
In a bowl, whisk together eggs and both cheeses.
Drain spaghetti and add to the pan with pancetta. Remove from heat.
Quickly pour in the egg and cheese mixture, tossing to coat the pasta without scrambling the eggs.
Season with salt and black pepper. Serve immediately.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and tikka masala spice mix for at least 1 hour.
Heat oil in a pan and sauté onions and garlic until golden brown.
Add marinated chicken and cook until done.
Add tomato puree and simmer for 10 minutes.
Stir in cream and cook for another 5 minutes.
Serve hot with rice or naan.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
summary: A quick and healthy vegetable stir fry with a savory sauce.
instructions: Heat vegetable oil in a wok or large pan over high heat.
Add garlic and ginger, sauté for 30 seconds until fragrant.
Add all vegetables and stir fry for 5-7 minutes until tender-crisp.
Add soy sauce, oyster sauce, and sesame oil. Toss to coat evenly.
Cook for another 2 minutes. Serve hot with rice or noodles.
